trans-unit.source: Represents a customized view of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma vista personalizada de um <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Whenever data is displayed, such as in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, only one version of each row can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que os dados são apresentados, tal como num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>controlo, apenas uma versão de cada linha pode ser apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The displayed row is a DataRowView.
trans-unit.target: A linha apresentada é um DataRowView.

trans-unit.source: A DataRowView can have one of four different version states: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, and `Proposed`.
trans-unit.target: Um DataRowView pode ter um dos quatro de versão diferente de Estados: `Default`, `Original`, `Current`, e `Proposed`.

trans-unit.source: After invoking <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> on a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, any edited value becomes the `Proposed` value.
trans-unit.target: Após invocar <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>num <xref:System.Data.DataRow>, qualquer valor editado torna-se a `Proposed` valor.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until either <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> is invoked, the row has an `Original` and a `Proposed` version.
trans-unit.target: Até ser <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>é invocada, a linha tem um `Original` e um `Proposed` versão.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A> is invoked, the proposed version is discarded, and the value reverts to `Original`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>é invocado, a versão proposta é ignorada e o valor reverte para `Original`.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> is invoked, the DataRowView no longer has a `Proposed` version; instead, the proposed value becomes the current value.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>é invocada, o DataRowView já não tem um `Proposed` versão; em vez disso, o valor proposto torna-se o valor atual.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default values are available only on rows that have columns with default values defined.
trans-unit.target: Os valores predefinidos só estão disponíveis das linhas que têm colunas com valores predefinidos definidos.

trans-unit.source: Begins an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Inicia um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> to add a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>para adicionar um <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BeginEdit method is identical to the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginEdit é idêntico ao <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método de <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After calling BeginEdit, any changes made to the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> can be rolled back by calling <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar BeginEdit, as alterações efetuadas ao <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>pode ser revertido chamando <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: Call the BeginEdit method before allowing users to change row values.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método de BeginEdit antes de permitir aos utilizadores alterar os valores de linha.

trans-unit.source: After values have been changed, you retrieve the new values by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.RowVersion%2A> to `DataRowVersion.Proposed`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de tem sido alterados valores, é possível obter os novos valores definindo a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.RowVersion%2A>para `DataRowVersion.Proposed`.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView.RowVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check the values with a business rule, and roll back the changes if needed by calling <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>, or call <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> to accept the changes.
trans-unit.target: Verifique os valores com uma regra de negócio e reverter as alterações se for necessário chamando <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>, ou chamar <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>para aceitar as alterações.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit procedure.
trans-unit.target: Cancela um procedimento de edição.

trans-unit.source: After calling CancelEdit, all changes to the row are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar CancelEdit, todas as alterações para a linha são revertidas.

trans-unit.source: You can also roll back changes by calling <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A> on the parent <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Pode também reverter as alterações ao chamar <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A>no principal <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the specified child <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> para o elemento subordinado <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> com o subordinado especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.target: a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the specified child <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> para o elemento subordinado <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> com o subordinado especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> and parent..
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> para o elemento subordinado <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> e principal...

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The parent object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto principal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> name and parent.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> para o elemento subordinado <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> nome e o principal.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o <xref href="System.Data.DataRelation"> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: The parent
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal

trans-unit.source: a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: a <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> for the child <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref> to which this row belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref> a que pertence esta linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataView" name="DataView" href=""></xref> to which this row belongs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataView" name="DataView" href=""> </xref> a que pertence esta linha.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a row.
trans-unit.target: Elimina uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The row is not permanently deleted until <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> is invoked on the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that the row belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A linha não é eliminada permanentemente até <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>é invocado no <xref:System.Data.DataTable>que pertence a linha.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> may be invalid when a `DataRow` is deleted from the underlying table.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>poderá ser inválida de quando um `DataRow` é eliminada da tabela subjacente.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> becomes invalid, operations that access values associated with <xref:System.Data.DataRowView%2C> such as Delete, throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>fica inválido, as operações que aceder aos valores associados <xref:System.Data.DataRowView%2C>, tais como eliminar, acionar uma excepção.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView%2C> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: Commits changes to the underlying <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> and ends the editing session that was begun with <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.BeginEdit*>. Use <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.CancelEdit*> to discard the changes made to the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Consolida as alterações para subjacentes <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> e termina a sessão de edição foi iniciada com <> </> *>. Utilize <> </> *> para rejeitar as alterações efetuadas a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"></xref> is identical to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se atual <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"> </xref> é idêntico para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>a ser comparada.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if object is a and it returns the same row as the current ; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: Se object é um e devolve a mesma linha como atual ; caso contrário .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o indicativo de hash do <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code 1, which represents Boolean <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of this instance is nonzero; otherwise the integer zero, which represents Boolean <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash de número inteiro com sinal de 32 bits 1, que representa o valor boleano <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o valor desta instância é diferente de zero; caso contrário, o número inteiro zero, que representa o valor boleano <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the row is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is in edit mode; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha está no modo de edição caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"></xref> is new.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"> </xref> há de novo.

trans-unit.source: After you call you call <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>, IsNew will be true for the returned <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar chamar <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>, IsNew irá ser verdadeira para devolvido <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>

trans-unit.source: IsNew will be true until either <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A> is called on the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>, or <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: IsNew ser verdadeira até ser <xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>é chamado para o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>, ou <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>seja novamente chamado.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView.EndEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: (There is only one new row.)
trans-unit.target: (É apenas uma nova linha.)

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row is new; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a linha é uma novidade; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value in a specified column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor numa coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: The specified column.
trans-unit.target: A coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the column.
trans-unit.target: O valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value in a specified column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor numa coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: String that contains the specified column.
trans-unit.target: Cadeia que contém a coluna especificada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the column.
trans-unit.target: O valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Event that is raised when a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"></xref> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Evento é desencadeado quando um <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"> </xref> propriedade é alterada.

trans-unit.source: This event fires when the column value associated with the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> changes.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é acionado quando o valor de coluna associado a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>alterações.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: This change does not cause the associated index position of the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Esta alteração não irá causar a posição de índice associado do <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>ser alteradas.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> being viewed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> que está a ser visualizado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> being viewed by the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> sejam vistos pelo <xref href="System.Data.DataRowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current version description of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a descrição da versão atual do <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A> property specifies both <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> and <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>propriedade especifica ambos <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>e <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion>definições.</xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> </xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion>, and <xref:System.Data.DataViewRowState>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, <xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion>e <xref:System.Data.DataViewRowState>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataRowVersion> </xref:System.Data.DataRowState>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the RowVersion property are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Original" name="Original" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Proposed" name="Proposed" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para a propriedade RowVersion são <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Original" name="Original" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_Proposed" name="Proposed" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom attributes for this instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um conjunto de atributos personalizados para esta instância de um componente.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView>

trans-unit.target: Um AttributeCollection que contém os atributos para este objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the editor for this object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o editor para este objeto.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> of the specified type that is the editor for this object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the editor cannot be found.
